tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE judicial_decisions (
    case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name STRING,
    court_name STRING,
    judge_name STRING,
    decision_date DATE,
    summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HumanRightsCases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    case_date DATE,
    court_name VARCHAR(50),
    case_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE LegalPrecedents (
    precedent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    precedent_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    case_id INT,
    judge_id INT,
    precedent_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES HumanRightsCases(case_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (judge_id) REFERENCES Judges(judge_id)
);

CREATE TABLE judicial_decisions (
    decision_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    case_title TEXT,
    date_of_decision DATE,
    judge_name TEXT,
    court_name TEXT,
    summary TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE human_rights_violations (
    violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name TEXT,
    violation_type TEXT,
    date_reported DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE judicial_decisions (
    decision_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    decision_date DATE,
    court_name VARCHAR(255),
    case_number VARCHAR(100),
    decision_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE judges (
    judge_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    judge_name VARCHAR(255),
    birthdate DATE,
    nationality VARCHAR(100),
    gender CHAR(1)
);

CREATE TABLE research_papers (
    paper_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    paper_title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);
